content: create you won cute mini crochet stockings to add a handmade touch to your christmas tree or string together to create a festive garland the easy to follow written crochet pattern also features a link to the video tutorial on youtube so you can be confident in your ability to complete this project the pattern also explains how to change colours while working in the round without it being visible - no more obvious changes in your projects the pattern works up quickly and is ideal for beginners materials needed per stocking - 4mm crochet hook -45m dk/size 3 yarn - designer used 100% acrylic yarn ***pattern details*** - uk terms & us terms - file type pdf - page size a4 210mm x 297mm - language english - download will include 2 colour pdf s 1 x uk terms 1 x us termss the finished item measures 6 from top of loop to toe when made with dk and 4mm hook don t forget to follow and tag me on social media facebook www facebook com/cosyrosieuk instagram @cosyrosieuk www cosyrosieuk com all design and photos are copyright of cosy rosie uk fiona field © 2022
